sentences.en: A physical examination is a preliminary to joining the army.
sentences.cn: 体格检查是参军的初步.

sentences.en: A preliminary groundwork must be laid this year.
A preliminary hearing was due to start today before Mr Justice Hutchison, but was adjourned.
sentences.cn: 今天法官哈奇森先生本来要主持一项预审，但暂时休庭了。

sentences.en: A preliminary inquiry into a murder case closed yesterday.
sentences.cn: 对谋杀案的预审昨天结束.

sentences.en: After a few preliminary remarks he announced the winners.
sentences.cn: 说了几句开场白之后，他即宣布优胜者名单。

sentences.en: After the usual preliminaries , the chairman made his announcement.
sentences.cn: 一段例行的开场白之后，主席发布了通告。

sentences.en: All these preliminary organizational tasks were normal to such enterprises.
sentences.cn: 对如此伟业,所有的初步组织工作,均属正规.

sentences.en: He has easily won the preliminary contest for the high jump.
sentences.cn: 他轻松地通过了跳高预赛.

sentences.en: Investigations normally take the form of a preliminary examination.
sentences.cn: 研究工作通常包括初步验证.

sentences.en: It was agreed that another round of preliminary talks would be held in Peking.
sentences.cn: 经协商，新一轮的预备会谈将在北京举行。

sentences.en: On the twenty - sixth, Lord Cork presented his preliminary appreciation.
sentences.cn: 26日, 科克勋爵提出了他的初步估计.

sentences.en: Some preliminary polls show him out in front.
sentences.cn: 一些初步民意调查显示他处于领先位置。

sentences.en: The preliminary computation is the same as that for ordinary levelling.
sentences.cn: 概算与普遍水准测量相同.

sentences.en: the preliminary stages of the competition
The winner of each preliminary goes through to the final.
sentences.cn: 每场初赛的获胜者进入决赛。

sentences.en: They are taking preliminary steps in preparation for a possible war.
sentences.cn: 他们正在为应付一场可能的战争做初步的准备.

sentences.en: They refused to negotiate unless three preliminary requirements were met.
sentences.cn: 如果三项先决条件得不到满足,他们就拒绝谈判.

words.tran_cn: 预备的;前兆的;开始的;在前的

phrases.tran_cn: 初始阶段，初期；原始阶段
初步试验；预先测试；初级试验

trans.tran_cn: 初步的，初级的，预备的，开端的，序言的
trans.tran_en: happening before something that is more important, often in order to prepare for it

trans.tran_cn: 准备工作，预赛，初步措施，（对学生等的）预考
trans.tran_en: something that is said or done first, to introduce or prepare for something else
